description: Hello! I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in building robust, scalable, and user-centric web applications. I have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, architecting complex solutions, and optimizing application performance. My expertise spans a wide range of technologies, including ReactJS, TypeScript, Angular, Python, AWS, NodeJS, Redux, MongoDB, SQL, and Jest. I'm passionate about delivering exceptional user experiences and driving business growth. Looking forward to connecting with you!
